titleStmt.title: Fraterna correptio, or, The saints zeale against sinful altars delivered in a sermon preached on a day of humiliation for the error, heresies, & schisms of our times and nations / by Z.C., minister of the word.
titleStmt.author: Crofton, Zachary, 1625 or 6-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for Robert Gibbs,
